metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20216 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Privoxy in versions before 3.0.31. A memory leak that occurs when decompression fails unexpectedly may lead to a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.26-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.26-5ubuntu0.1').
